title: REQUIEM FOR A DREAM
description:
Requiem For A Dream

The novel was written by Hubert Selby, Jr.

The film adaptation was directed by Darren Aronofsky, and starred Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, and Marlon Wayans. 

Burstyn was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance.
